products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Dark Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A trending shade, this dark grey perfect fit venetian blind adds an bold, modern look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This handsome perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of great fabrics - here we have it in ash. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit Sunwood
products.description: This gorgeous perfect fit sunwood blind comes in a range of quality fabrics - here we have it in carbon. In addition, this blind includes controls to the left, no frame and no brackets (which are all options).

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Infusion Asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc stone grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion Asc Taupe Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc taupe perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Sakura Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Silver Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Made to measure hive silkweave ash grey perfect fit pleated blind, px78004.

products.title: Mayfair Taupe Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required mayfair taupe dimout perfect fit.

products.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace.

products.title: Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Update your windows with the exquisite mayfair grey dimout perfect fit, for a charming look to your windows. The smooth grey tone is dappled only by the light and shadow of the blind's ripping pleats, to give an ultra-textured look that would go beautifully with other tactile grey fabrics within your interior. The frame is designed to be a perfect colour match for white and anthracite upvc windows, so the installed blind will look like a seamless part of your windows.

products.title: Vassal Mist Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: For something a little different, vassal mist twins a vintage and nautical feel, to create a muted grey blind with the gentlest touch of green. The colour is created with tiny dense checks that can only be seen up close, for flawless continual colouration when standing back. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories.

products.title: Soho Slate Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Soho slate dimout perfect fit features fabric built out of overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and energetic slate tone. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, creating a dark sparkle effect as the light shines through. The innovative perfect fit system clips in flush against your window with no need for tools or drilling, and removes from your window without leaving a trace, for easy cleaning of the blind or room.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Anthracite Grey Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A bold dark grey shade, this zambezi anthracite perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Grey shades are not only clean and trend-setting, but can be either complimented with co-ordinating accessories, or can be the background to a more bolder colour palette. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Stone Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A medium neutral cream shade, this zambezi stone perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Cream shades create an uplifting and fresh look with introducing warmth into the room. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors. At swift direct blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new perfect fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in their yorkshire workshop by their team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Hive Blackout Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hive blackout silkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
